name: Hex Phase
description:
Exploding with colors in a visual extravaganza, a new form of genre, the VFX Puzzle spouts from the depths to bring you Hex Phase! Match the hexagons to its vibrant center to complete a phase whilst switching between two or three other phases, or even just a single phase on Super, Deluxe, and Regular modes respectively. Match the phase, rotate the phase, and amass more time as you drift through the waves of visual stimuli being shot into your corneas. Piece together Hexagons and complete phases to amass points and extend the clock.
There are additional gameplay modes and options available in the:
C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Hex Phase\HexPhase_Data folder assuming a default Steam installation location or:
"Custom Place"\Steam\steamapps\common\Hex Phase\HexPhase_Data.
Make sure you give them a look!
Controls:
-Spacebar/click the screen to lay down a hexagon piece
-WASD/click the arrows to turn the phase
-Shift/click the center to switch between phases
-Click the High Score to reset it
